item.title: SIX UX: Transition and animation gallery
item.description: SIX UX is a gallery of transitions and animations shown as 6 second videos. Andreas Popp combined Vine app videos with tumblr to showcase otherwise ephemeral movements found around the web. Low fi and awesome. Check it. http://sixux.com/
